name: Jade Screen
description:
When your active character receives at least 2 DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character receives at least 2 DMG: </color>Decrease DMG taken by 1.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
